title: Laundry Detergent Effectiveness
question_text:
A company just launched a new formula of laundry detergent, and is curious about the effectiveness of the detergent as measured by proportion of clothes that were stain free after being washed.
Of the following designs, which would be the best way to use results from their customers to determine the effectiveness of this new detergent?

100
 current customers
